name: Decohere
headline: Real-time generative AI
description: Decohere is building product and infrastructure for real-time generative AI. We enable our customers to iterate towards their creative vision without waiting for long-running GPU jobs.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:generative-ai; industry:consumer; industry:video; industry:ai; location:seattle

founders.name: Rishi Bhuta, Founder
founders.description:
Decohere, CEO. 

Real-time image and video generation. Working on new ways for us all to explore creative abundance.

founders.name: Will Stith, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and CTO of Decohere. Working on realtime generative AI, with an emphasis on AI video.  

Previously at Amazon doing greenfield R&D projects in Robotics and Project Kuiper.

[Get started](https://decohere.ai/</home>)
Features
Use cases
[Affiliate](https://decohere.ai/</affiliate-program>)[Pricing](https://decohere.ai/</pricing>)
# World's fastest AI generator
[Start for Free](https://decohere.ai/</home>)
## AI Character Generator
Photorealistic People
Generate AI images of popular characters. Decohere's advanced AI technology brings these characters to life with stunning accuracy and detail.
[Learn more](https://decohere.ai/</ai-character-generator>)
## Create AI Characters
Design Your Character
Design your own AI characters with Decohere's character creator. Use it as an avatar, influencer, or anything else you can imagine.
[Learn more](https://decohere.ai/</create-ai-character>)
## Realtime AI Image Generator
Instant creativity
Generate images with the world's fastest AI generator. Scroll through infinite variations to find the perfect shot. Spend less time waiting on generations and more time creating your masterpiece.
[Learn more](https://decohere.ai/</features/real-time-ai>)
## Video Generator
Create what can't be filmed
Transform your images into incredible AI videos. Generate your starting image with Decohere or bring your own. Control the motion of the video to create your perfect shot.
[Learn more](https://decohere.ai/</features/generate-video>)
## Creative Upscaler
Crisp resolution and stunning details
Upscale images to 4x the resolution and add stunning new details. Control the creativity of the AI upscaler for personalized results. Finalize your real-time AI images with the upscaler to make jaw-dropping results.
[Learn more](https://decohere.ai/</features/creative-upscaler>)
## Reference Person
Character consistency across AI images
Create consistent images by using a reference person. The AI will generate images of your person, while allowing you to control everything else via prompting. Only a single photo is required, and no lengthy setup needed.
[Learn more](https://decohere.ai/</features/reference-person>)
## AI Stations
Unlimited images in your style
Decohere's unique AI stations generate unlimited AI images in the style that you choose. Create a station with any image you like and get inspired by the infinite variations. Watch the stream of creativity from the world's fastest AI generator.
[Learn more](https://decohere.ai/</features/ai-stations>)
The new age of AI generated content starts here
[Try now](https://decohere.ai/</home>)

generated_description:
**Decohere: Redefining Real-Time Generative AI**

Founded in 2022 and based in Seattle, WA, Decohere is a startup on the cutting edge of generative AI technology. As part of Y Combinator's Winter 2023 batch, the company is laser-focused on its mission to revolutionize how creators interact with AI by providing real-time image and video generation capabilities.

### What They Do

Decohere is all about speed and creativity. Their platform enables users to produce striking visual content instantaneously, eliminating the typical wait times associated with long GPU jobs. Here’s a brief overview of what they offer:

- **AI Character Generator**: Create photorealistic images of characters, from superheroes to personalized avatars.
  
- **Realtime AI Image Generator**: This is touted as the world’s fastest AI image generator, allowing users to explore countless variations with minimal wait time.

- **Video Generator**: Transform static images into dynamic videos, giving life to what typical filming cannot capture.

- **Creative Upscaler**: Enhance image resolution up to four times while adding intricate details, perfect for those seeking a polished look.

- **Reference Person Feature**: Generate consistent images based on a single reference photo, making character design simpler and more effective.

- **AI Stations**: Create custom stations for generating unlimited images in your chosen style, driving a continuous stream of creative inspiration.

### Use Cases

Decohere's technology is versatile, catering to a wide range of creative fields like anime, architecture, gaming, and more. Whether you're an illustrator, a video game developer, or just someone with a passion for design, there's a tool in Decohere’s suite to match your needs.

### The Team and Leadership

With a compact team of four, Decohere benefits from focused collaboration. Diana Hu serves as their Group Partner, providing strategic guidance as they navigate the complexities of their ambitious market. 

### Final Thoughts

Decohere is not just another AI startup; it’s a breath of fresh air for creatives looking to merge imagination with state-of-the-art technology. With a commitment to real-time iteration and user empowerment, they are positioning themselves as leaders in the generative AI space.

For more information, check out their website: [Decohere](https://decohere.ai). 

Get ready—this is just the beginning of a new age in AI-generated content.
